ch0194_10_akagi/0101_0701_02_10:
If you and I are headed toward the same goal,
I suppose I will lend you my strength.
ch0194_10_akagi/7101_0701_01_10:
There is nothing more foolish than being compelled
to act by feelings and emotions.
ch0194_10_akagi/7101_0701_02_10:
I’m only working together with you because I
determined that it would be in my best interests.
ch0194_10_akagi/7102_0701_01_10:
Time and space shape our world in an
intertwining spiral.
ch0194_10_akagi/7102_0701_02_10:
If either were to be destroyed, our world would
quickly collapse.
ch0194_10_akagi/7102_0701_03_10: Our reality is a very fragile thing.
ch0194_10_akagi/7103_0701_01_10:
You and your partner Pokémon are connected to
each other through your spirits. You’re able to turn
that into a tremendous power.
ch0194_10_akagi/7103_0701_02_10: I cannot understand that kind of power at all.
ch0194_10_akagi/7104_0701_01_10:
Although I’m dressed differently than usual, my
attitude hasn’t changed at all.
ch0194_10_akagi/7104_0701_02_10:
As long as it’s functional, I don’t care at all what
I wear.
ch0194_10_akagi/7105_0701_01_10:
No matter how long you and I work together,
our philosophies will never be compatible.
ch0194_10_akagi/7105_0701_02_10:
You think of your partner Pokémon as friends,
while I see them as an extension of my power.
ch0194_10_akagi/7105_0701_03_10: These two mind-sets simply cannot be reconciled.
ch0194_10_akagi/7105_0701_04_10:
Despite that, we can still have conversations like
this—and even be of assistance to one another at
times. Strange, isn’t it?
ch0194_10_akagi/1701_0701_01_10: Allow me to offer you this.
ch0194_10_akagi/1701_0702_01_10:
A tool is only as useful as what you make of it.
Use it well.
ch0194_10_akagi/2501_0701_01_10:
To a person like you, a good dream is probably
something delightful and fun.
ch0194_10_akagi/2501_0701_03_10:
I think what Darkrai shows me are good
dreams... Eternal dreams of darkness.
ch0194_10_akagi/2501_0701_04_10:
Dreams free of both joy and suffering, where there
are no constraints or obligations...
ch0194_10_akagi/2501_0701_05_10: I see these dreams as something complete.
ch0194_10_akagi/2501_0702_01_10:
“Good dreams” are an illusion. They disappear in
an instant when you wake up, never to return.
ch0194_10_akagi/2511_0701_01_10:
Unlike humans—who are unreliable—machines act
according to logic, and their actions always bring
about the same results.
ch0194_10_akagi/2511_0701_02_10:
Machines aren’t influenced by the uncertainties of
spirit or emotions.
ch0194_10_akagi/2511_0701_04_10:
The world is filled with ugly things, but I think
machines alone are beautiful.
ch0194_10_akagi/2511_0702_01_10: If this world was made up only of machines...
ch0194_10_akagi/2511_0702_02_10:
I think it would be close to the complete world that
I envision.
ch0194_10_akagi/3001_0701_01_10:
Every morning when I wake up, it almost feels
as if I’m on the border of dreams and reality.
ch0194_10_akagi/3003_0701_01_10:
When you’re tired, it’s advisable to get some rest.
Overworking yourself is inefficient.
ch0194_10_akagi/3005_0701_01_10:
The light of day and the darkness of night are both
incomplete... We must adapt to the time of day.
